name: Seamen may sue for injuries; venue
text: §268-9  Seamen may sue for injuries; venue.  The State consents to suits against the department of transportation by seamen for injuries occurring upon vessels under the authority of the Hawaii state ferries system in accordance with section 688, Title 46, of the United States Code.  The venue of the actions may be in the first circuit court or the circuit wherein the injury occurred. [L 1963, c 186, §8; Supp, §114-8; HRS §268-9]
